short.ar: التجميع الرأسي لعلامات التبويب والبحث السريع في المفضلة وفي تاريخ مشاهدات الصفحة
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Vertical grouping of tabs, quick search in favorites and in the history of page views
short.de: Vertikale Gruppierung von Registerkarten, Schnellsuche in den Favoriten und im Verlauf der Seitenaufrufe
short.es: Agrupación vertical de pestañas, búsqueda rápida en favoritos y en el historial de páginas vistas
short.fr: Regroupement d'onglets verticaux, recherche rapide dans les favoris et historique des pages
short.ru: Вертикальная группировка вкладок, быстрый поиск в избранном, и в истории просмотров страниц.
short.zh_CN: 垂直分组选项卡，用于快速搜索收藏夹和页面历史记录

long.ar,es:
Convenient navigation through tabs, search for open tabs, search in favorites. + Add tags for quick search.
Easy interface, and fast speed

version 1.14.* - stable version
Added history.
Increased speed and improved styles.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Convenient navigation through tabs, search for open tabs, search in favorites. + Add tags for quick search.
Easy interface, and fast speed

version 1.14.* - stable version
Added history.
Increased speed and improved styles.
1.14.3 Improved response speed.
1.14.4 Fix bugs.
1.14.5 Styles and functional.
1.14.6 Fixed search in bookmarks.
1.14.7-8 Added sorting tabs, removing duplicate bookmarks and customizing the interface.
1.14.9 fix bugs
1.14.10 
Number of open tabs added to the icon
Button added to tabs, add remove tab in bookmarks
Second click disables tag
1.14.11 
1) increased window height
2) added tabs animation
3) scroll saved in tabs
long.de,fr,ru,zh_CN:
Convenient movement, and reading the description of tabs
Convenient search in favorites, and display of your popular sites
